Red Vacance Black Wedding

Ano: 2011

Sinopse: Segment 1- Red Vacance: Heerae, a young woman and a married middle-aged man, Taemook have been involved in an affair for 6 years. They plan to go on a vacation, but Boksoon, his wife finds out their affair and takes him to a remote place. There the she asks him about his affair. As he explains his affair, she becomes angrier. She is about to burn him. Meanwhile, Heerae receives a text message from him and she goes to meet him, but the text message was actually sent by his wife. All three persons then meet at a vacation home. *********Segment 2 -Black Wedding: As soon as a professor and his female student meet, they have an affair. Their relationship continues. One day, she asks him to officiate her wedding and he accepts. After the wedding the professor goes to the place where they had the affair, but the student, who should be leaving for her honeymoon, arrives at the place.
